p: Caffeine that was proposed to be a protective factor for PD is primarily metabolized by cytochrome P450 1A2 (CYP1A2). A study, investigating three CYP1A2 polymorphisms, found that the coffee-PD association was the strongest among subjects homozygous for either variant allele c.-164A>C ( p for interaction = 0.05) or c.1545T>C ( p for interaction = 0.04) (i.e., slow metabolizers of caffeine) [ 56].
